name: Flapping Around
description:
A little game where you play as a ball trying to collect as many points as you can!

Dodge the falling acid rain as you jump flappy bird style to each score ball. But be careful! Get to close to the ground and you'll hit the lava!

---

This is a non-serious game that I made in a week. Comment on the bugs you find in the comment section. Because I made this more of a game dev exercise rather than a full release, updates may be very slow or absent. T
